description: McKay-Thompson series of class 27c for the Monster group.
links: D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).
J. McKay and A. Sebbar, Fuchsian groups, automorphic functions and Schwarzians, Math. Ann., 318 (2000), 255-275.
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
formula: Expansion of q^(1/3) * eta(q) / eta(q^9) in powers of q.Euler transform of period 9 sequence [ -1, -1, -1, -1, -1, -1, -1, -1, 0, ...].a(n) = (-1)^n * A062245(n).
mathematica: QP = QPochhammer; s = QP[q]/QP[q^9] + O[q]^90; CoefficientList[s, q] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 12 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x + A) / eta(x^9 + A), n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 26 2004 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 01 2001
